document_data.mainbody:
Funglesby was a beast master thug who opposed the The Guild crime gang of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Funglesby was a gold dwarven woman with short curly brown hair and a clean-shaven face. She wore a simple leather armor jerkin and carried a small crossbow.
Funglesby had access to a rangers spells, including poison spray, hail of thorns, and protection from poison. She was accompanied by her loyal animal companion â€“ a large armored wolf.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Farlin led a gang of Guild members in dealing with the Stone Lord and his men. The new kingpin secretly served the Absolute and was trying to remove the Guilds influence from across the Gate. Farlins group faced a band of the Stone Lords men led by the tiefling Cairos, including Funglesby. They clashed under the Wyrms Crossing bridge in Rivington over a shipment of supplies. However, the meeting devolved into a battle and either of squadss fate remained uncertain.
